imdb.plot outline: We hear about new technology every day - we see it all around us and we use it in our homes and offices, but how does it work? This is the series that tells you what is happening in different fields of technology. From virtual autopsies to giant robotic arms to an artificial uterus to the inner workings of an eco-house, this is the series that gives you the lowdown on how everything works.
imdb.title: How Does That Work?
